messages.subject: RE: Shogun miniseries
messages.msgSnippet: I just found it on Ebay for about $84.  Not too bad, since it usually goes for about $200 new.  You might have to cut and paste the URL into the browser if the
messages.messageBody:
I just found it on Ebay for about $84. Not too bad, since it usually goes for about $200 new. You might have to cut and paste the URL into the browser if the hyperlink gets cut off in this email.

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&category=1161&item=3301746697
